mapper.select: SELECT mm.merchantno AS merchantNo, mm.krname AS krName, mm.cp_email AS cpEmail, ms.merchantid AS merchantId FROM ms_merchant mm INNER JOIN merchant_managers mms ON mm.merchantno = mms.merchantno INNER JOIN merchant_service ms ON mm.merchantno = ms.merchantno INNER JOIN service_sys ss ON ms.merchantid = ss.merchantid WHERE mm.partnerno IN (220, 221) AND mm.regdt BETWEEN #{regDt} AND now() AND (ss.cardcode = 'C001' AND ss.status = 'A001');
